summary: Diff adds a single-page React app with sticky header navigation, warm industrial theme tokens, and references a generated logo image. However, the required generated image assets are not present in the diff, and several required section labels/placeholders cannot be confirmed (and nav labels appear to not match the required wording). The diff also introduces Internet Identity/auth and actor hooks that were not requested for a marketing site.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a dedicated section for “Tractor Music Systems” labeled as such and easy to find via navigation/scrolling.
missing_requirements.reason: Navigation label shown is “Music Systems”, not “Tractor Music Systems”; the actual section heading cannot be verified due to truncation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a dedicated section for “Tractor Modification Materials” and explicitly mention reasonable prices.
missing_requirements.reason: Navigation label shown is “Modifications”, not “Tractor Modification Materials”; the required “reasonable prices” wording is not evidenced in the provided diff snippet/summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a dedicated section for “Electrical Mechanic Services” clearly stating an electrical mechanic is available.
missing_requirements.reason: Navigation label shown is “Mechanic Services”, not “Electrical Mechanic Services”; the required statement about electrical mechanic availability is not evidenced in the provided diff snippet/summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a Contact section with placeholders (Phone, Address, Hours) clearly marked as “To be added/Coming soon” (not fake data).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary indicates a contact section exists, but the required placeholder fields and “to be added”/“coming soon” wording are not visible in the provided (truncated) content.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add generated static image assets (logo + hero banner) under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them in the UI.
missing_requirements.reason: UI references the logo path, but no files under frontend/public/assets/generated are included in the diff; also no evidence of the required hero banner image being present and displayed.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication context/provider and related login/identity management hooks added.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is for a static marketing website and does not request authentication features; introducing II flows is out of scope for the stated requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Actor creation hook and react-query setup for backend interaction.
hallucinated_features.reason: No backend interaction/data fetching requirements were requested for the marketing site.
